00038 class wxStfPython {
00039 public:
00040     wxStfPython() : entry(true), init(true) { }
00041     ~wxStfPython() { Leave(); }
00042

00044     bool Init();
00045

00052 class wxStfPythonThread : public wxThread {
00053 public:
00054     wxStfPythonThread(wxWindow* parent) : wxThread(), globals(0), pPyWnd(0), pParent(parent), isInitialized(false) {  }
00055     ~wxStfPythonThread() { }
00056 
00057     // thread execution starts here
00058     virtual void *Entry();
00059 
00060     // called when the thread exits - whether it terminates normally or is
00061     // stopped with Delete() (but not when it is Kill()ed!)
00062     virtual void OnExit();
00063     
00064     wxWindow * GetPyWnd() { return pPyWnd; }
00065     
00066     bool IsInitialized() const { return isInitialized; }
00067     
00068 private:
00069     PyObject * globals;
00070     wxWindow * pPyWnd;
00071     wxWindow* pParent;
00072     wxPyBlock_t blocked;
00073     bool isInitialized;
00074 };
